H0.text: What sort of plants belong to the genus Ilex. Quercus

H1.text: What sort of plants belong to the genus Ilex. Rhododendron

H2.text: What sort of plants belong to the genus Ilex. Vaccinium

H3.text: What sort of plants belong to the genus Ilex. Ilex

A4.text: Ilex () or holly is a genus of over 570 species of flowering plants in the family Aquifoliaceae, and the only living genus in that family.

A5.text: Ilex has the most species of any woody dioecious angiosperm genus.
